Summary: This app contains statistics for every affiliated football competition in Northern Ireland
The Football NI app will keep you up to date with fixtures, results, team line-ups, match statistics, league tables and more for every affiliated football competition in Northern Ireland.  
 
You can use the Football NI app to track your favourite teams, players or matches and check their stats. You can also receive notifications whenever a match event related to your “favourites”, such as a goal, booking, or the final whistle, is recorded onto the IrishFA COMET system. 
  Match information that can be accessed via the Football NI app includes: 
* Team starting line-ups, substitutes, coaches, and team officials. 
* Chronological timeline of match events including goals, yellow and red cards, substitutions, start and end times of each half, extra time, and penalties. 
* Additional match information such as the match officials, the playing venue, attendance, and team kits. 
* Ability to follow LIVE matches in real-time mode. 
Competition information that can be accessed via the Football NI app includes: 
* Results of matches that have already been played including the team line-ups, match events timeline, match officials, the playing venues, attendance, and team kits. 
* Upcoming fixtures.  
* League tables. 
* Form tables. 
* Competition statistics including top goal scorers, yellow cards, and red cards. 
Player information that can be accessed via the Football NI app includes: 
* Previous appearances with full match data including the team line-ups, match events timeline, match officials, the playing venues, attendance, and team kits. 
* Easy to understand colour coding of the match outcome for the player’s team (Green = Win, Yellow = Draw, Red = Loss). 
* Personalised player statistics grouped by competition including appearances, minutes played, goals scored, yellow cards and red cards. 
* Animated confetti view of player’s goals and other match events send direct to the device which can then be shared with friends. 
Team information that can be accessed via the Football NI app includes: 
* Results of previous matches, with full match data including team line-ups, match events timeline, match officials, the playing venues, attendance, and team kits. 
* Upcoming fixtures. 
* Easy to understand colour coding of the match outcome (Green = Win, Yellow = Draw, Red = Loss). 
* Contact details of the team.
Selecting your favourites via the Football NI app: 
* Add Match to favourites for quick access and to receive notifications of all events during that match. 
* Add Team to favourites for quick access, and to receive notifications of all events on all matches of that team. 
* Add Player to favourites for quick access, and to receive notification of all events on all matches where that player is in the line-up.  
* Add Competition to favourites for quick access. 
Receiving real-time notifications via the Football NI app:  
* Get push notifications in real-time mode to your device. 
* Turn on/off push notifications for your favourite matches, players, and teams. 
* All match event details are contained within the notification: minute, event type (goal, substitution, yellow card, red card, final whistle), player, club and logo.
